Customer menu is used to navigate the customers as a form of a interface

Match - Class in Unnamed Package
Match class to allow encapsulation of customer variables
Match() - Constructor for class Match
No-arg constructor
Match(String, String, String, int, double, String) - Constructor for class Match
Construct a new Match object with specified match ID, name, venue, number of tickets, price of tickets, and the file path where its details are saved.

P

Q

Menu to choose which match to simulate the queue for.

R

readCustomerFromFile() - Static method in class Main
Reads customer data from file to check the data in the file(if there are duplicates for signup for example)
readTicketSoldFromFile() - Static method in class Main
Reads tickets sold data from file to get the data in the file(to calculate the statistics data)

S

T

TicketSold representing the ticket sold where numOfTickets is integers and ticketPrice are double
